evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: a. Declare that the Directives—including the February 28 Guidance and March 25 Guidance—and Defendants’ other actions to implement the Directives are unlawful and unconstitutional

extracted.value: a. Declare that the Directives—including the February 28 Guidance and March 25 Guidance—and Defendants’ other actions to implement the Directives are unlawful and unconstitutional

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: b. Declare that NIH’s termination of grants pursuant to the Directives, beginning on February 28, 2025, is unlawful and unconstitutional

extracted.value: b. Declare that NIH’s termination of grants pursuant to the Directives, beginning on February 28, 2025, is unlawful and unconstitutional

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: c. Temporarily restrain and/or preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants from implementing or enforcing the Directives going forward, including from terminating any grants or withholding review of applications, based on allegedly no longer effectuating agency priorities or in a manner that this Court has determined is unlawful

extracted.value: c. Temporarily restrain and/or preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants from implementing or enforcing the Directives going forward, including from terminating any grants or withholding review of applications, based on allegedly no longer effectuating agency priorities or in a manner that this Court has determined is unlawful

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: d. Order NIH to restore the grant awards, retroactive to the respective termination date, that NIH has terminated pursuant to the Directives or in a manner this Court has determined is unlawful or unconstitutional, including the grant terminations based on allegedly no longer effectuating agency priorities

extracted.value: d. Order NIH to restore the grant awards, retroactive to the respective termination date, that NIH has terminated pursuant to the Directives or in a manner this Court has determined is unlawful or unconstitutional, including the grant terminations based on allegedly no longer effectuating agency priorities

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: e. Order Defendants to file status reports at regular intervals confirming their compliance with the Court’s order(s) and judgment(s) in this case

extracted.value: e. Order Defendants to file status reports at regular intervals confirming their compliance with the Court’s order(s) and judgment(s) in this case

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: f. Enjoin Defendants from imposing any negative consequences on Individual Plaintiffs, Plaintiff Ibis, or Associational Plaintiffs’ Members and Pre-Members for involvement in this litigation

evidence.text: g. Award Plaintiffs’ reasonable costs and attorneys’ fees

evidence.text: h. Issue such other relief as the Court deems proper
